functionDecorators.name: getSignerOfAddress
functionDecorators.description: Given a signed address, returns the signer of the address.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The recovery id of the incoming ECDSA signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: Output value r of the ECDSA signature.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: Output value s of the ECDSA signature.

functionDecorators.name: getSignerOfMessageHash
functionDecorators.description: Given a message hash, returns the signer of the address.

parameterDecorators.name: v
parameterDecorators.description: The recovery id of the incoming ECDSA signature.

parameterDecorators.name: r
parameterDecorators.description: Output value r of the ECDSA signature.

parameterDecorators.name: s
parameterDecorators.description: Output value s of the ECDSA signature.
